Coro - Command Bar for Custom Commands, Bookmarks, and Search

Description: Coro is a powerful and intuitive Chrome extension that adds a sleek command bar to the top of any webpage, giving users the ability to streamline their browsing experience with ease. With Coro, you can create and manage custom commands, save bookmarks for quick access, and perform searches without leaving your current page with just pressing (CMD/CTRL + Shift + L).

Key Features:
Custom Commands: Create your own commands to automate tasks, trigger actions, or open specific websites. Tailor your browsing experience to fit your workflow.
Bookmarks: Save and access your favorite sites instantly by assigning them custom keywords, turning your command bar into a personalized bookmark manager.
Quick Search: Search the web or specific websites directly from the command bar. Customize search engines or set up site-specific searches for fast and precise results.
Minimal Design: The unobtrusive command bar only appears when you need it, keeping your screen clutter-free while providing powerful functionality at your fingertips.
Why Choose Coro:
Coro turns your browser into a productivity tool by giving you control over your commands and searches, allowing for faster, more efficient navigation. Whether you're a power user looking for shortcuts or someone who just wants easier access to bookmarks, Coro makes browsing smoother and smarter.

Coro: A Command Bar for Everything!
